response.overview: Violence At Home Has Reached A Freighting Level. Mr. And Mrs Nkansa Cannot Hold Their Marriage Together. Their Young Talented Daughter ls Forced To Leave The Home And Abandon A Bright Career, Only To Fall Into The Hand Of A More Deadly Violence. This Eye-opening Drama Is Loaded WithMessage For The Couple, The Youth And Society.
response.tagline: The Sinister Drug Baron, The Desperate Carriers ....Disemboweled If Operation Fails...
response.title: Aboa Bone
